mapper.select: select ,u.c_username,r.c_roleName,a.c_createDate,a.c_updateDate from sys_user_role a left join sys_user u on u.id = a.n_userId left join sys_role r on r.id = a.n_roleId where a.n_deleted = 0 order by id limit #{page.index},#{page.rows}
select count(id) from sys_user_role where n_deleted = 0
